html: I swore an oath to defend the Constitution—the President’s emergency declaration tramples on our system of checks and balances. I’m disappointed but not surprised by his veto of our bipartisan resolution to end the national emergency. I will vote to override the veto.

html: It’s time to close the #CharlestonLoophole. That’s why I’m supporting a commonsense bill sponsored by @WhipClyburn that will extend the waiting period for firearm purchases to 10 days, to ensure that guns don’t end up in the wrong hands.
text: It’s time to close the #CharlestonLoophole. That’s why I’m supporting a commonsense bill sponsored by @WhipClyburn that will extend the waiting period for firearm purchases to 10 days, to ensure that guns don’t end up in the wrong hands.

html: In 2016, the Charleston loophole meant that 4,170 guns were sold to people with criminal records, mental illnesses, or other circumstances which should have prevented them from being able to buy a gun—because FBI background checks weren’t completed in a three day window.
text: In 2016, the Charleston loophole meant that 4,170 guns were sold to people with criminal records, mental illnesses, or other circumstances which should have prevented them from being able to buy a gun—because FBI background checks weren’t completed in a three day window.

html: In 2015, the Charleston loophole in our gun safety laws allowed a self-proclaimed white supremacist to buy a gun that he then used to kill 9 black parishioners at a Bible study—despite a record of illegal drug possession that should have disqualified his purchase.
text: In 2015, the Charleston loophole in our gun safety laws allowed a self-proclaimed white supremacist to buy a gun that he then used to kill 9 black parishioners at a Bible study—despite a record of illegal drug possession that should have disqualified his purchase.

html: Tomorrow is the first paycheck federal workers will miss because of the #TrumpShutdown. I’ll be giving my first speech on the House floor today, talking about affected OC families and calling for relief. TUNE IN (I start in the next hour) >> https://www.c-span.org/video/?456718-2/house-session …

html: Over 40,000 Californians are furloughed or working without pay because of the #TrumpShutdown. Some have resorted to borrowing from retirement accounts or GoFundMe accounts or missing loan payments. That’s unacceptable. #EndTheShutdown #GetGovtGoinghttps://www.latimes.com/politics/la-na-pol-shutdown-government-workers-20190108-story.html …

html: Our TSA officers are working without pay—including mandatory overtime—because of the #TrumpShutdown. That’s not good security, and puts all Americans at risk. #EndTheShutdown

html: I was thrilled to have my kids for my first week in DC, but it also helped me reflect again on the challenges of balancing work and being a mom. As I told @politico, work-life balance is not like perfectly balanced scales—it’s balance like riding a bike; just keep moving forward!https://twitter.com/politico/status/1080418186024099840 …

html: Last Friday, I joined @HouseDemocrats in introducing #HR1 to reduce the influence of big money on Congress. With Washington working again for Orange County families instead of special interests, we can act on: healthcare, clean energy, gun violence prevention, and more.
text:
Last Friday, I joined @HouseDemocrats in introducing #HR1 to reduce the influence of big money on Congress. With Washington working again for Orange County families instead of special interests, we can act on:
 healthcare,
 clean energy,
 gun violence prevention,
and more.

html: My thoughts are with the victims of last night’s shooting in Torrance and their families. One of the first things I did after being elected was join the Gun Violence Prevention Task Force, because we must do more to prevent tragedies like this. #EnoughIsEnoughhttps://twitter.com/ocregister/status/1081600307652628481 …

html: Yesterday, I was sworn in to represent #CA45, with my kids at my side. I’m ready to get Washington working better for OC families. Follow here to see how I’m fighting for healthcare, campaign finance reform, clean energy, and gun violence prevention #ForThePeople.pic.twitter.com/w6mNFkYiRN
